author: samwilsn
content:
Spec Sync #43
 - <@!564718359304863744> working on getting all tests to pass, specifically frontier transaction tests; and bug fixes
 - <@!689161464829050960> got the docs build working again, have to write a doc describing the next-gen EIP process
 - <@!243183686562873344> been out of commission
 - <@!830368514225340436> evm trace PR feedback, put up a PR for a tool to create new hard forks

There's still a bug in byzantium that's preventing chain sync, so we're holding off on merging constantinople until that's sorted out.

content: Some discussion on how the specifications might be used in the future: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/core-eips-in-an-executable-spec-world/8640
